name: The Show Must Go On
story_text: You shine a bright light on the players on the stage and compel them to finish the performance.

low.conditions: the target can't willingly leave the area (EoT)

mid.conditions: the target can't willingly leave the area (save ends)

high.conditions: the target can't willingly leave the area (EoT) if they can't willingly leave the area (save ends)

effect: Each ally within distance can't obtain lower than a tier 2 outcome on the next test they make before the start of your next turn.
